article_title: Democrats tie vulnerable GOP senators to Trump
article_text:
Huntsville, TX (77320)

Today

Cloudy this morning. Scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 84F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Mostly cloudy with scattered thunderstorms mainly during the evening. A few storms may be severe. Low 72F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.author: Kery Murakami   CNHI Washington Reporter

og.description: WASHINGTON — Now that Donald Trump is the GOP's presumed nominee for president, Republican senators in tough re-election races are in the spot of having to voice support for the
